title: Fireheart
description: A strong, intelligent eighteen-year old, Ariana is frustrated by her inability to contribute to her forest band as she is chained to a large, though friendly, dragon. She suffers an unrequited love for attractive Alex, an older blacksmith. Having lost her parents in a fire, she feels she has nothing.In this YA Fantasy novel, find out how a storm waylays her, changing the course of her life.
author: Giulietta Maria Spudich
